name: The Morgue Fissure Between Worlds
description:
Descend into darkness... The Morgue Fissure Between Worlds, provides a dark mysterious environment that is waiting to be discovered. Your world is connected with many others. There are things that must be forgotten, relics that must be discovered, and worlds to be charted.... Take care though, this adventure is not for the faint of heart. You will need to muster the strength to uncover this bygone age.

The Morgue Fissure Between Worlds: is a first person survival horror. The game doesn't hold your hand. There are no tutorials or walkthroughs. You must figure out the mechanics and strings to this uncharted land. An experience that will leave you feeling haunted, The Morgue makes sure to pluck every one of your psychological nerves.
Descend into darkness, uncover the forgotten....Survive the horror.

Features-
1- Short Puzzles
2- Hidden Passage Ways
3- Single Player
4- Psychological Horror
5- Expanding Gameplay With Monthly Updates
6- 15-40 minute gameplay for every chapter. (Chapter 2 is Released in May)

Chapter 1 - April 2017
Chapter 2 -TBA 2017
Chapter 3 - TBA 2017
